short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open multiple URLs to the right of the current tab with options to ignore duplicates and load in reverse order.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool takes a list of web pages in plain-text format and opens them all in new tabs. Paste the list into the text area (one website address per line), select your options and click "Open URLs".
